titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1) to close the achievement gap with accountability, flexibility, and choice, so that no child is left behind.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-336, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 1 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 110.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 315.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/13/2001--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1 (elementary and secondary education).
